## Import


An existing resource can be imported using its type token, name, and identifier, e.g.

```sh
$ pulumi import azure-nextgen:authorization:roleManagementPolicy d693780f-543d-4aad-a4c8-139ff6a1db8d /subscriptions/892f85f0-fd69-4fe8-8ee2-bda821252ac3/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/RoleManagementPolicies/d693780f-543d-4aad-a4c8-139ff6a1db8d 
```
